NOT RECOMMENDED AT ALL, do not use it. Why? I used the app to pay for a carpark in Switzerland. I registered my car plate as X (country code letter)-0000-ABC. I paid for the car park using the app but when I arrived at the car there was a fine. The fine was 40CHF but I had already paid to EasyPark. I go to the app and notify I have been issued with a fine when I have paid to EasyPark as well. I sent a picture of the fine and some days later they answered to me saying that the car plate from what a registered is not the same as in the fine. What is the difference? The difference was that the person who checks the car park tickets (controller) said on the fine that my car plate is 0000-ABC-X and because of the controller ‚Äúwrote‚Äù the country code letter at the end and not at the beginning, the car plate is not the same and therefore I must pay for the fine. Are you talking seriously? I sent an email to EasyPark again and what do I get‚Ä¶ SILENCE from them, no answer, very good‚Ä¶ Consequences? I paid to EasyPark the car park + the 40CHF fine. Conclusion? Never again EasyPark, no customer service to help you (they stop talking to you when there is no interest in to help you), they get paid for the car park and you pay a fine. Bravo, good job ‚òπ‚òπ

What I do like: ability to pay without actual use of cash and to renew parking from a distance. What I don't like: 1) minute dial is cumbersome and useless, since you will pay the full hour amount for anything between 1 minute and 1 hour. Either change to 1 hour intervals wihout the dial button, or interpolate price to 10 minute intervals, as the paper bills allow already. Or do both. 2) design suggestion: when you authorise payment, actively ask which car you want to pay for. Current design keeps the last parked car as default, therefore I got a parking fine a few times because I didn't notice I had chosen the wrong car. 3) design suggestion: allow for more than one simultaneous parking from the same app. E.g. If I want to pay for my wife, a friend or other member of my family. Current design does not allow it. I liked the previous app much better.

This app creates more wakelock than anything else and causes a huge performance hit on your phone.  running this command in the adb shell solved it:  cmd appops set net.easypark.android RUN_IN_BACKGROUND ignore  and maybe this too:  cmd appops set com.snapchat.android WAKE_LOCK ignore  Instant improvement!
